entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 19 March 2023
